review: Like that the item has many different options. Don't like that you have to pay to see extra episodes of some shows. Along with having to be a prime member to watch some movies without paying.
author: Crystal Y Counts

review: Love it! So much easier to watch Netflix through versus our bluray player. My 2 year old loves watching kids videos on YouTube.
author: Angie B

review: It's here and it's a breath of fresh air.
author: Tommy Harris

review: Use the Apple tv, tried the Google chrome cast. This however is the best smart tv option available. Affordable and Mini in nature. Apart from all the apps including YouTube it also has games. Games that are actually fun to play.Remote is the best part, it's not infra red so one can be anywhere you change the channel. The only negative I have is that it is thicker than shown in pictures. A little misleading in that sense. However all the functionality over comes everything.
author: Khan538
